mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of the properties of the Stuanton Development Company, Staunton, Virginia, October, 1890 / by Dunlap & Barnett, Civil Engineers, Roanoke, Va
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dunlap & Barnett.
Norris Peters Co.
Staunton Development Company (Staunton, Va.)
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 52 x 96 cm. on sheet 61 x 101 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Includes street names and block numbers.
Contains a b&w view of Staunton, another of John K. Roder's Brass Goods and Curtain Pole Factories, and a colored image of the proposed Hotel Altemonte.
Two advertising stamps in upper and lower margins (crossing neatlines): Lot drawing June 4th, and Great sale June 2 & 3, 1891, Staunton Development Co., Staunton, Va.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Signature of "The Rev. James E. Bear" on verso. Stamped as Gift, 1934.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Staunton Development Company (Staunton, Va.)--Maps.
Real estate development--Virginia--Staunton--Maps.
Real property--Virginia--Staunton--Maps.
Staunton (Va.)--Maps.
